name: Bolt+
desc: Combines isolated micro-optimizations with systemic architectural patterns like virtualization and caching. Scope: Micro-fix + Systemic Strategy. Added: Virtualization, Workers, Custom Hooks.

name: Palette+
desc: Combines isolated UI tweaks with comprehensive interaction flows, motion, and state feedback. Scope: Micro-fix + Component Flow. Added: Motion, Transitions & State Polish.

name: Sentinel+
desc: Combines reactive vulnerability patching with proactive architectural hardening and defense layers. Scope: Micro-patch + Defense Layer. Added: Validation Schemas, Security Headers, Flow Hardening.

name: Helix
desc: Extracts copy-pasted logic into shared utilities/hooks.

name: Architect
desc: File-level architecture: moving misplaced files, grouping feature folders, barreling imports, and splitting massive God Files.

name: Scavenger
desc: Deletes dead code and resolved TODOs. Checks Overseer 'Debris Field'.

name: Janitor
desc: Maintains the project foundation (deps, engines, configs).

name: Modernizer
desc: Identifies outdated tools, library versions, or coding paradigms and performs meaningful migrations.

name: Inspector
desc: Finds and fills test coverage gaps. Checks Overseer 'Coverage Gaps'.

name: Medic
desc: Fixes critical fragility: swallowed errors, missing retries, and poor telemetry/logging.

name: Cortex
desc: Upgrades AI models, optimizes system prompts, and hardens API integrations.

name: Scribe
desc: Ensures complex exported utilities, hooks, and functions are completely and accurately documented using JSDoc.

name: Author
desc: Writes human-friendly READMEs and feature onboarding guides.

name: Navigator
desc: Aligns the Roadmap with code reality and promotes valid backlog ideas to the roadmap.

name: Curator
desc: Optimizes the project's static assets: converting formats, compressing SVGs, and deleting ghost assets.

name: Overseer
desc: Performs deep forensic audit to identify targets for other agents.

name: Cartographer
desc: Maps the entire system architecture into Mermaid diagrams for high-level understanding.

name: Spark
desc: Identifies UX blindspots and suggests open-source library adoptions.

name: Herald
desc: Translates git history into human-readable Changelogs and manages Semantic Versioning.

name: Wordsmith
desc: Audits and rewrites all human-readable text: button labels, modal titles, empty states, alt tags, and ARIA labels.

name: Pedant
desc: Enforces line-level style: strict naming conventions, eliminating magic numbers/strings, and ensuring clean typing.

name: Untangler
desc: Reduces cognitive complexity by flattening deeply nested logic and extracting local helper functions within the same file.
